website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for full-bodied espresso for your Vertuo machine, you'll get excellent flavor and 50 cups from these Diavolitto capsules.
pros: Boasts rich, bold flavor that appeals to serious espresso lovers
Avid customers refer to the flavor as strong and intense
Delicious black or combined with a little frothed milk
cons: Rare reports of capsules that had close "best by" dates
each) but satisfying considering this espresso's intensity

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: These are the expresso pods for the Vertuoline Nespresso. These will not work in the old machines. For those that want expresso, they are great. For those that want a rich cup of coffee, but not expresso, simply hit the brew button a second time after the first run and you will get a deluded, but not so intense, great cup of coffee. Two for the price of one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Collen

customer_reviews.title: These came in perfect condition all of the capsules were sealed and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These came in perfect condition all of the capsules were sealed and they taste strong, just the way I drink my coffee, 50 capsules for $43 you can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: More about the Nespresso machine than the pods
customer_reviews.text: I have a Jura Capressa Z7 which is an all in one espresso machine. Whole beans in, espresso out. Top of the line for the all in one machines but still requires some effort. Bought the Nespresso Ventuo on a whim and am I glad I did. For the money, best espresso from a home machine. Best crema and easiest to use. The Pods make it so simple and with an electric milk frother, easiest Starbucks knock off ever. It's like a battery powered drill. After you buy it you wonder why you waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: mcfo

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor, though I do run it thru twice, as I think it tastes better and there is a nice full espresso cup to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M

customer_reviews.title: Almost cafe-grade
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these-- they really taste like a cappuccino or latte you get in a cafe (be sure to use the milk frother that comes with the machine. Only problem is they're not cheap (about 85 cents per, and there's no knock-off brands) , but compared to Starbucks that's a heck of a deal, plus you don't need to leave your house.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: So good and strong. Only espresso I like besides Starb
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I do my own Iced Doppio with vanilla Torani and cream. It’s $2.75 at Starbucks. I pay almost $80 a month for it plus waiting in line. With these pods I pay $50 for the same drink and no line.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Creamer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended! Rich in Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: These are great espressos for this type of machine. The flavor is really good and very frothy. * TIP * Most people don’t know that you can run this 1 pod through the machine up to 3 times, without it tasting bitter. I do this to lighten it up a bit and it still tastes strong. Look at my pictures for reference, as it’s still dark in color after running thru the machine 3 times. It’s something you cannot do with the double espresso pods from this brand. Those can only be ran thru the machine once. This is the best deal I have found for these online $42.50 for 50! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: IntjKoukla

customer_reviews.title: This is the best espresso for my taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the best espresso for my taste. While the Nespresso selections may be limited, this has a rich full body flavor that is well balanced. Bravo! My new favorite. Starbucks be gone!!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: mellon

customer_reviews.title: If you’re worried about super fresh, I’d probably not get your Nespresso from ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really buy expresso for the taste. If you’re worried about super fresh, I’d probably not get your Nespresso from Amazon. The case I received today is one year old exactly with 6 months left to use. To me, it tastes good. I love the ease of use of the Nespresso machine. Update: so after my 3rd order, I’m still happy with the machine and this expresso. Super quick to make. 30 seconds and I’m drinking my expresso...if I want to..But, experimented and found out the expresso is inhibiting the absorbtion of my thyroid medication. So now I have to wait two hours to drink coffee/expresso.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but tiny
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best Nespresso variety for flavor. The problem is they only make one small shot and even if you have your own foamer/steamer it is not enough espresso to make a decent latte. Why they do not make this in a larger size is beyond me! The green full-size pods are the closest variety to this so that is what I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: "Life Changing!" - My Wife
customer_reviews.text: There once was a coffee shop, I can't remember the name, I think it started with an "S" and had something to do with constellations or something? Star...something or another. ; ) Well, that place isn't needed in my house anymore. The wife had a "slight" addiction to their coffee and in her words, "this is life changing!" It's life changing for me to, because we pay $0.70 per cup of coffee now vs $2.00, it's definitely a win win for this family!
customer_reviews.author: Poetic Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Best home brewed espresso I've ever tasted!
customer_reviews.text: These little guys produce an espresso only beaten by professional coffee shops in europe imho. I'm more of a cappuccino/latte kind of guy but I do enjoy a short espresso now and then. The crema is crazy thick and the aroma is amazing. I find that this intensity level is too much for my belly and honestly can't drink this straight. I will use these for my milked coffees and then buy a lighter roast to drink straight.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Great value and these are delicious
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is about 10 dollars cheaper than the Nespresso store and the pods are not stale tasting at all but just as fresh as if you had bought them at the retail location. Love the flavor of this specific pod because it’s so rich and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Nicklas

customer_reviews.title: Diavalto espresso capsules have a really rich flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Loved that I can order these capsules on Amazon in smaller quantities than on Nespresso website. Shipped quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: R. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Espresso
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality, wonderful tasting espresso. The amount brewed from these is ridiculously small! You'll use 2 capsules for a small espresso cup. This makes them even MORE EXPENSIVE! Like $2.00 a cup expensive. Hope and pray that your guests don't like espresso, because it will get really expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Gar Reyem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Flavor & we'll purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box I noticed the pods to be smaller than the Nepresso standards. I thought this is what you get when you purchase cheap. BUT I was wrong. The flavor is that of a dark roasted coffee, and the pod is excellent for 3 to 4 cups of good coffee. We'll purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Norman C., Ribble

customer_reviews.title: BEST Coffee !!!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in Europe, and drank European espresso coffee. So I know THAT distinguishing TASTE. With Nespresso, although it's pricey, I found my perfect match. Addictive - you don't want to go back to a regular coffeemaker produced cup of coffee. Guaranteed. And no, I don't work for Nespresso!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee, so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the Nespresso VertuoLine for about 6 months now and it is great. These are delicious expresso pods and are really well packaged. I wish that they were a little less expensive, but I have not seen a better price elsewhere either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really strong flavor
customer_reviews.text: I did not pay attention when I bought and the scale says that is really strong flavor, if you don’t like a REALLY strong coffee that one isn’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Josias Junior

customer_reviews.title: Great espresso
customer_reviews.text: Tasty espresso! And super fast shipping was a plus! Had a slight issue with the order but seller took care of it promptly! Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: A nice treat to start your day!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this flavor. I brew 1 pod 3 times and pour in the frothy milk. I do t use sugar ever and its delicious on its own. Wish it was less expensive or I’d give it out as a gifts during Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: CAgirl1069

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee my favorite I can’t live without it & love the strong flavor and I always order this one nothing else & always fast delivery thank you amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy a strong cup of coffee in the morning, helps wake me up and feel human. These pods make a great little espresso that'll wake you up without compromising flavor.
customer_reviews.author: J's Review

customer_reviews.title: Great Espresso
customer_reviews.text: I use two pods a day to make my daily morning Americano and I can’t complain. Great consistent flavor perfect for a shot or mixture. Super easy process to make espresso at 5:30am.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey but delish
customer_reviews.text: These pods are over all a little pricey but the flavor of darkness and amount of caffeine in the Diavolitto is our favorite. It has the most caffeine as well. I love it with some extra creamy whipped cream.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Defective pods
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pods recently and about half of them were defective - just dark colored water came out and nothing that tasted like coffee. Terrible quality control as this has happened before but infrequently. Cant justify spending so much for defective products. Giving up on Nespresso.
customer_reviews.author: Texas doc

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Received as expected. Now I’m all set for when my latte cravings hit - no need for Dunkin!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: My normal drink is 4 shots espresso over ice with heavy whipping cream and monkfruit (ketoer) and for this price it's still cheaper to go to a Starbucks($3.15) or caribou ($3.75).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective.. waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We order these pods regularly but this batch gave us nothing but light brown water. We opened all boxes and tried from each set to see if it was just a singular defect. Nope. So giant waste of money!! Will not be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: VSU1m@

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor
customer_reviews.text: I really love the flavor, I think the price is too high for 4 boxes. But the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Yuly Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is enemic I threw it out. It’s an absolute joke. All of the 14 ounce pods tasted like dish water. I hope other coffee company like Starbucks,Peet’s ,etc will come up with decent coffee in pods that will fit the great nesspresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: chief

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this product, would purchase again. Would be nice to have this item as part of the subscribe and save!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Full Big Bold Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great espresso with a big, bold flavor. Can't recommend this enough. If you're someone that spends $4-6 per day on a latte, etc. do yourself a favor and get these for ~$.85 per pod and some milk and make it at home. I would personally say these are better than most cafes you would go to anyway.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzypiggie

customer_reviews.title: Dark , Rich, Bold
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely getting my money's worth from my Nespresso Vertuoline machine! I prefer the dark roast , so the Diavolitto collection is devastating delicious .
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Our “buy again” favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is a “buy again” item for our coffee enthusiast family! The seller is reliable and these ship so quickly!! This is our go-to Nespresso!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: So much packaging - need the recycle bag offered by Nespresso
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Tolliver

customer_reviews.title: burnt
customer_reviews.text: it's only been 3 hours and i still have that burnt coffee taste in my mouth
customer_reviews.author: michael peters

customer_reviews.title: If you are black espresso lover, not for you
customer_reviews.text: Trying to feel real espresso taste, but in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Makarenko

customer_reviews.title: Small pods and not the best coffee
customer_reviews.text: If you like really intense espresso, this is for you. If you do not, I would definitely shy away from this. Also, and this is no fault of the seller because I should have read the description better, these are the smallest pods available for this line of Nespresso. You get maybe 2 ounces of coffee from each pod. I actually run each pod twice to increase the amount and water it down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Clark

customer_reviews.title: No more stopping at coffee shops for us.
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this product, it's a staple in our home. Whether you want an espresso or add it to your cup of coffee for a flavor boost and foamy topping.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Diavolitto forever
customer_reviews.text: These are great authentic pods- flavor is awesome and always comes damage free.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love this flavor. I reuse The same pod 2-3x for one coffee as I love Iced espresso.
customer_reviews.author: ZimA.

customer_reviews.title: Best espresso flavor and kick
customer_reviews.text: Love these . Buy them every couple of weeks for making iced caramel macchiatos . Great flavor and easiest way to get them in bulk delivered by far.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee - reorder consistently! New packaging makes removal of the pods from the package so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Farruggia

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love how it taste full body and the value of the cost was decent.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? They are pods needed for the machine
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: My first choice for espresso.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite flavor. Very robust and tasty. Wish it cost less but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starbucks can shove it.
customer_reviews.text: Nespresso wins, hands down! Consistent, delicious flavor and I actually feel a great boost from the caffeine. The price for these little pods compared to basically any drink at Starbucks is ridiculous. Nespresso, you have my heart!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. I love the rich and smooth taste of nespresso , the down side is that it is a bit expensive
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed ElBerry

customer_reviews.title: Best price I found
customer_reviews.text: Much faster shipping than I expected. Best price I found, even comparing with the official website. I am very happy with this coffee. It's absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best strong espresso at home.
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I can get this here on Amazon. My favorite product along with the Torani Sugar Free Chocolate Sauce they sell here. YUM
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wright Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee ever
customer_reviews.text: For the days you need that sting pick-me-up... this is the coffee to have. Love it! Great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off Espresso
customer_reviews.text: I have tried these pods sold directly from Nespresso and these are not it. It’s weak and doesn’t taste the same at all!! These are definitely not the same pods and I’m never buying coffee pods from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not taste like real diavolitto
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 years buying the diavolitto nespresso and is 11 intensity so strong coffee and that coffe I received taste like American coffee not taste that real diavolitto
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and great value!
customer_reviews.text: You get 50 pods for less than a dollar each which is a bargain for Nespresso Virtuoline. The flavor is strong and rich without being bitter like other strong coffees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caffine, yes please!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love this stuff! We have a baby so boy oh boy do we need the best kind of caffeine you can get and this totally has our vote!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Semenero

customer_reviews.title: I use these every single morning!
customer_reviews.text: Such good espresso and amazing to mix with almond milk for a latte!
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this one
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to espresso. I start every day with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great expresso. My wife loves diabolito cups
customer_reviews.text: Great robust flavor and nice substitute to my lavazza rivo cups.
customer_reviews.author: jesus alberto

customer_reviews.title: Great price, just don’t order more than 60 day supply.
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was the same as ordering from Nespresso, but expires 3 months from getting them, so make sure you order the amount you’ll be drinking within in a few months of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coffee, amazing looks. But, $1 per cup seems like too much for a home machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ghanshyam W.

customer_reviews.title: Love the coffee - like the price
customer_reviews.text: For less than a buck a shot, I enjoy this coffee. I cut it with hot water to make an Americano to stretch out the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Danny de Varona

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious espresso at a great price. Pods always arrive in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: About perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect in a smaller cup, I do run the water through twice and add a little cream. delicious
customer_reviews.author: Rider_Global

customer_reviews.title: Nesspresso Esspresso
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the espresso , very good quality coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time and a great way to wake up in the morning
customer_reviews.text: High grade espresso, arrived on time and a great way to wake up in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: Ditch energy drinks
customer_reviews.text: Finally made the switch from energy drinks to one of these pods in the morning and haven't looked back. Definitely recommend if you need a caffeine fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad stuff
customer_reviews.text: This was very strong and some people like that. I don't mind strong if it has good flavor. This was not good at all. Had to get a refund, that's how bad it was for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine, but the package was left outside my apartment building and not at the lobby desk. So the statement that it was handed directly to someone is false.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pods not properly coded to work with Nespresso Coffee brewing machinę.
customer_reviews.text: Coffee was fine but Half of the pods did not work properly with my Nespresso Machinę.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: My favorite nespresso pods.
customer_reviews.text: I buy these once every two months for my nespresso. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best espresso ever
customer_reviews.text: Best espresso ever!! I was a big Starbucks fan, but ever since I bought my Nespresso machine I haven’t purchased coffee! I just make my own! So smooth and rich, but not bitter.
customer_reviews.author: Elyssa Campos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Nespresso machine, and this is the best deal for espresso out there!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get better than Nespresso when it comes to home brewed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. I wish more came in the package. I go through it too quickly

customer_reviews.title: Help!

customer_reviews.title: Good Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey but very good coffee. I will buy again

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it is the best quality and very convenient (easy to use).

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and super fast shipping! Will buy again! Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer

product_meta.title: Nespresso Capsules VertuoLine, Diavolitto ,Dark Roast Espresso Coffee, 50 Count Coffee Pods, Brews 1.35oz
product_meta.description: Style:DiavolittoA high intensity Espresso for coffee aficionados. Energized by highly roasted Robusta and Brazilian Arabica coffee beans, with an aroma that hints at oak wood and leather, balance is achieved with a creamy texture
feature_bullets: HIGHLY INTENSE & POWERFUL: This Nespresso coffee features an energized espresso from a blend of Brazilian coffee with an aroma that hints at oak wood and leather with a creamy texture that balances out this powerful espresso coffee

INTENSITY 11: This Nespresso coffee blend is for coffee aficionados with a high intensity for a surprisingly powerful espresso with a smooth and fine texture from a blend of coffee from Central and South American
DIAVOLITTO ESPRESSO BREWS 1.35 OZ: These Nespresso VertuoLine pods are part of the Espresso range that will provide you with a 1.35 oz serving of a traditional espresso coffee beverage

WE RECYCLE: Nespresso aluminum capsules are fully recyclable and guarantee coffee freshness - we provide different options for recycling your used aluminum coffee pods to fulfill our collective commitment to protecting the environment

VERTUOLINE ONLY: Nespresso Vertuo delivers you a full range of cup sizes and coffee styles from espresso to Alto XL with easy to use Nespresso pods. Enjoy hot or pour over ice. (VertuoLine Capsules are not compatible with OriginalLine machines )

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
